sentences.en: A peach skin is covered with fuzz.
Applying fuzz mathematical method to evaluate food organoleptic quality is a noveler method.
sentences.cn: 应用模糊数学法评价食品感官质量是一种较为新颖的方法.

sentences.en: Fluff: Loose surface fibres on paper . Also called Fuzz , Lint.
sentences.cn: 起毛: 纸面上的松散纤维.

sentences.en: Fuzz : Loosely bonded fibres projecting from the surface of paper. Also called Fluff, Lint.
sentences.cn: 起毛: 在纸面上,纤维一端与纸面结合,另一端则松散的情况.

sentences.en: He had a baby fuzz round his jaw.
sentences.cn: 他的下巴上长着细细的胡须。

sentences.en: He tried to clear his head of the whisky fuzz.
sentences.cn: 他试图清醒因威士忌而发晕的头脑.

sentences.en: Imprecise calculations show up as fuzz in the picture.
sentences.cn: 不精确的计算会使图像模糊.

sentences.en: Later, they grow chartreuse fuzz, making pale green auras in the sun.
sentences.cn: 接着会张出黄绿色的绒叶, 在阳光下映出淡绿的光辉.

sentences.en: Performance evaluation should utilize Fuzz Comprehensive Evaluation ( FCE ) with financial and non - financial targets.
sentences.cn: 业绩评价应坚持可控和匹配的原则,利用财务指标和 非 财务指标,以纵向维度和横向维度为评价的标准,运用模糊综合评价法定量地确定经营者业绩.

sentences.en: The fuzz of the toy bear is very soft and pretty.
sentences.cn: 玩具小熊身上的绒毛十分纤柔秀美.

sentences.en: The girls hair stood out in a fuzz round her head.
sentences.cn: 小女孩长了一头短短的卷发.

sentences.en: There is some tiny fuzz on the newly emerged tender sprouts.
sentences.cn: 刚长出来的嫩芽上有些细小的茸毛.

sentences.en: When Jack was born he had a fuzz of black hair on his head.
sentences.cn: 杰克出生的时候长着一头细细的黑发。

sentences.en: You got lint on your fuzz. - Ow! That's me!
sentences.cn: 你的毛上有线头-哦! 那是我身上的!

words.tran_cn: 模糊的；失真的；有绒毛的
作绒毛状飞散；变成绒毛状；变得模糊

trans.tran_cn: 绒毛，轻柔的物质，竖起来的短细的毛发
trans.tran_en: thin soft hair or a substance like hair that covers something

trans.tran_cn: 作绒毛状飞散；变成绒毛状；变得模糊
trans.tran_en: to make or become indistinct; blur
to make or become indistinct; blur
